Name: Rock Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Steel-type moves from damaging Rock-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Rock-type Pokémon.  You can get a Rock Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Gray Silk, a Rock Dust, and a Stone Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
